name: Chaffy's Math Class
description:
Welcome to Chaffy's Funsome Schoolhouse!

Meet Chaffy, who for some reason has the voice of a 7 year old (Don't question that.). Your friend lost forgot his homework assignments at school and he asked you to go and get them. But Chaffy likes to give his students math questions, because he says himself, "Math is like medicine, it helps you work." Get 3 questions correct and you'll earn a prize! Collect all of your friend's seven papers and exit Chaffy's school to win.

Notes about the mod:

Sorry that there is only 3 colors of wall and only the Blue Brick Wall uses the door and window textures, I was too lazy, I made the Light Blue and Purple Walls last minute. The title buttons are kind of in weird positions of the screen, I don't know why. And, for some reason you can't pick up any of the items in the shop.

Anyways, I'm not gonna update this mod since I'm am gonna make a new and improved version of Chaffy's Math Class called,

Chaffy's Standards in Working Hard

Chaffy's Standards in Art and Memes is gonna be created as a new version of Chaffy's Math Class but instead of Math it's Art and instead of collecting papers you collect memes and drawings. But there are probably gonna be some new stuff but I have to learn how to use Navmesh.

Note: In the secret ending, on the note on the fence, it says something else. (I forgot what it said). I changed the name of the next Chaffy mod at the last minute.
